document.full_text: webb simpson called it a "bad rule." he was penalized a stroke because the ball moved as he was addressing it on the green, costing him one stroke and perhaps his first pga tour victory.
document.title: 'bad rule' that hurt webb simpson under review
lines_and_colors: webb simpson called it a "bad rule." he was penalized a stroke because the ball moved as he was addressing it on the green, costing him one stroke and perhaps his first pga tour victory.
